matrix-project.description: Creates APP SDK Installer Packages for all combinations. (Windows and Linux)

com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.name: APPSDK_BUILD_NUMBER
com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.description: AMD APP SDK Build Number to use artifacts from.

com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.name: APPSDK_PKG_MM_NUMBER
com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.description: AMD APP SDK PKG MM Build Number to use artifacts from.

com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.name: SAMPLES
com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.description: Select the sample categories to be included in the package. The unselected sample category will not be included in the installer. Example, if Bolt is unchecked, then the final installer will not contain Bolt.
com.cwctravel.hudson.plugins.extended__c.descriptionPropertyValue: Bolt Sources and Binaries,C++AMP Sources and Binaries,OpenCL Sources and Binaries (Both 1.2 and 2.0 compliant),OpenCV (Sources and binaries)

scm.projectPath: ${LINUX}//depot/stg/app_sdk/installers/linux/... //workspace/... ${WINDOWS}//depot/stg/app_sdk/installers/win/APPSDK.ism //workspace/APPSDK.ism ${WINDOWS}//depot/stg/app_sdk/documentation/APPSDK_EULA.rtf //workspace/docs/EULA.rtf //depot/stg/app_sdk/samples/opencv/GestureRecognition/wave.oni //workspace/samples/opencv/GestureRecognition/wave.oni //depot/stg/cas/apps/cas/installers/InstallManagerExtn/UnifiedInstaller/resources/AMD.ico //workspace/resources/AMD.ico ${WINDOWS}//depot/stg/cas/apps/cas/AutomationFramework/scripts/Environ.bat //workspace/Environ.bat ${LINUX}//depot/stg/app_sdk/documentation/APPSDK-EULA-linux.txt //workspace/APPSDK-EULA-linux.txt "${WINDOWS}//depot/stg/cas/apps/cas/installers/Prerequisites/Microsoft ${VCNAME_FULL} Redistributable Package (${PLATFORM_ARCH}).prq" "//workspace/Prerequisites/Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable Package (${PLATFORM_ARCH}).prq"
scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off setlocal
echo APPSDK_PKG_MM: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_PKG_MM% echo SDKInstallManager_BUILD: %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_SDKInstallManager_BUILD%
echo APPSDK_DIR_VERSION: %APPSDK_DIR_VERSION% echo APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION: %APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION%
echo APPSDK Being Used: %APPSDK_BUILD_NUMBER% echo APPSDK Milestone: %MILESTONE%
echo APPSDK_MAJOR_NUMBER: %MAJOR_NUMBER% echo APPSDK_MINOR_NUMBER: %MINOR_NUMBER% echo APPSDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER: %SUBMINOR_NUMBER% echo APPSDK_PKG_NUMBER: %BUILD_NUMBER%
set APPSDKProductName=%MAJOR_NUMBER%.%MINOR_NUMBER%
If Not "%SUBMINOR_NUMBER%"=="0" ( set APPSDKProductName=%APPSDKProductName%-%SUBMINOR_NUMBER% ) if Not "%MILESTONE%"=="GA" ( set APPSDKProductName=%APPSDKProductName% %MILESTONE% )
echo APPSDKProductName: %APPSDKProductName%
::--------------------------------------------------------------------- set NEW_SETUP_NAME=AMD-APP-SDKInstaller-v%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%-%OSTYPE%-%M%-%P% set ISM=%WORKSPACE%\APPSDK.ism set MM_DIR=%WORKSPACE%\MM set COMMMON_MM_DIR=%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Common Files\Merge Modules set COPYRIGHT_YEAR=%DATE:~-4%
echo [INFO]Calling "%PERL%" -pi.bak -e "s?setup_%P%?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?setup_%P%?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?AMDSDKSetupMSI?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?AMDSDKSetupMSI?%NEW_SETUP_NAME%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?COPYRIGHT_PLACEHOLDER?%COPYRIGHT%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?YEAR_PLACEHOLDER?%COPYRIGHT_YEAR%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?APPSDKProductVersion_PLACEHOLDER?%APPSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?APPSDKProductVersion_PLACEHOLDER?%APPSDKProductName%?g;" "%ISM%"
echo [INFO]Calling %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?VSNAME?%VSVERSION%?g;" "%ISM%" %PERL% -pi.bak -e "s?VSNAME?%VSVERSION%?g;" "%ISM%"
if "%T%"=="v100" ( echo [INFO]Removing CPPAMP from SAMPLES if found REM need to remove C++ AMP from the SAMPLES variable set SAMPLES=%SAMPLES:CPPAMP,=% )
echo [INFO]SAMPLES: %SAMPLES%
REM Copy the appropriate vcredist executable to the %WORKSPACE%\Prerequisites directory for /f "delims=" %%F in ("%ISCMDBLD%") do set "ISCMDSYSTEM=%%~dpF"
echo [INFO]Calling copy /VY "%ISCMDSYSTEM%..\SetupPrerequisites\%VCNAME_REDIST% Redist\vcredist_%PLATFORM_ARCH%.exe" "%WORKSPACE%\Prerequisites" copy /VY "%ISCMDSYSTEM%..\SetupPrerequisites\%VCNAME_REDIST% Redist\vcredist_%PLATFORM_ARCH%.exe" "%WORKSPACE%\Prerequisites"
echo Executing: "%ISCMDBLD%" -f %SAMPLES% -a %P% -r %M% -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%MM_DIR%,%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -prqpath "%WORKSPACE%\Prerequisites" -y %PRODUCT_VERSION% -z ProductName="%ProductName%" -z ProductVersion=%PRODUCT_VERSION% -z MAJORNUMBER=%MAJOR_NUMBER% -z MINORNUMBER=%MINOR_NUMBER% -z BUILDNUMBER=%APPSDK_BUILD_NUMBER% -z PACKAGENUMBER=%BUILD_NUMBER% -z APPSDK_PRODUCTNAME="APP SDK %APPSDKProductName%" -z APPSDK_PRODUCT_VERSION="%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%" -z APPSDK_DIR_VERSION="%APPSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION="%APPSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert "%ISCMDBLD%" -f %SAMPLES% -a %P% -r %M% -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%MM_DIR%,%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -prqpath "%WORKSPACE%\Prerequisites" -y %PRODUCT_VERSION% -z ProductName="%ProductName%" -z ProductVersion=%PRODUCT_VERSION% -z MAJORNUMBER=%MAJOR_NUMBER% -z MINORNUMBER=%MINOR_NUMBER% -z BUILDNUMBER=%APPSDK_BUILD_NUMBER% -z PACKAGENUMBER=%BUILD_NUMBER% -z APPSDK_PRODUCTNAME="APP SDK %APPSDKProductName%" -z APPSDK_PRODUCT_VERSION="%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%" -z APPSDK_DIR_VERSION="%APPSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -z APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION="%APPSDK_DIR_VERSION%" -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert
::Create an archive of the web components if defined M ( if "%M%"=="W" ( %SEVENZ% a AMD-APP-SDKInstaller-v%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%-%OSTYPE%-%M%-components-%P%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% .\%P%\W\DiskImages\DISK1\*.cab .\%P%\W\DiskImages\DISK1\*.CAB .\%P%\W\DiskImages\DISK1\*.msi ) else ( echo [INFO]M Defined but is not W. M=%M% ) ) else ( echo [ERR]M not defined exit /b 1 )
endlocal

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash #Book-keeping script, which creates required directories and sets them up.
if [ ! -d "$PRODUCT_VERSION" ]; then mkdir -pv "$PRODUCT_VERSION" fi
#Move all contents to $PRODUCT_VERSION mv *.sh $PRODUCT_VERSION/ mv *.txt $PRODUCT_VERSION/ mv docs $PRODUCT_VERSION/ mv resources $PRODUCT_VERSION/ mv samples $PRODUCT_VERSION/
echo APPSDK_BUILD Version being used COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_BUILD: $COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_APPSDK_BUILD echo PRODUCTVERSION: $PRODUCT_VERSION echo PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION: $PRODUCTION_URL_VERSION echo ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION: $ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION echo ARCHIVE_EXTENSION: $ARCHIVE_EXTENSION echo OSTYPE=$OSTYPE echo APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION: $APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION echo APPSDK_DIR_VERSION: $APPSDK_DIR_VERSION
INSTALL_SCRIPT=$PRODUCT_VERSION/install.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[version\]?$APPSDK_DIR_VERSION?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[version\] with $APPSDK_DIR_VERSION in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
sed -i.bak "s?\[metricsversion\]?$APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[metricsversion\] with $APPSDK_METRIC_VERSION in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
sed -i.bak "s?\[MetricsCollectionTag\]?$MetricsCollectionTag?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[MetricsCollectionTag\] with $MetricsCollectionTag in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
# Replace the [SETUP_ARCHITECTURE] with the actual architecture i.e., x86 or amd64 in install.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[SETUP_ARCHITECTURE\]?$P?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[SETUP_ARCHITECTURE\] with $P in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [SDK_NAME] with the actual value i.e. APPSDK sed -i.bak "s?\[SDK_NAME\]?APPSDK?g" $INSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[SDK_NAME\] with APPSDK in the file $INSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
UNINSTALL_SCRIPT=$PRODUCT_VERSION/uninstall.sh sed -i.bak "s?\[version\]?$APPSDK_DIR_VERSION?g" $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[version\] with $APPSDK_DIR_VERSION in the file $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT exit $Retval fi
#Replace the [SDK_NAME] with the actual value i.e. APPSDK sed -i.bak "s?\[SDK_NAME\]?APPSDK?g" $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT Retval=$? if [[ $Retval -ne 0 ]]; then echo FAILURE: Could not replace \[SDK_NAME\] with APPSDK in the file $UNINSTALL_SCRIPT. exit $Retval fi
cp -vf "${SHFLAGS}" $PRODUCT_VERSION if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo FAILURE: Could not copy $SHFLAGS to $PRODUCTVERSION exit $Retval fi
chmod +x $PRODUCT_VERSION/install.sh chmod +x $PRODUCT_VERSION/uninstall.sh
rm -vf $PRODUCT_VERSION/*.bak
dos2unix -k $PRODUCT_VERSION/APPSDK-EULA-linux.txt chmod -v 444 $PRODUCT_VERSION/APPSDK-EULA-linux.txt
exit $Retval

#!/bin/bash
SH_NAME=$(basename "${BASH_SOURCE}") #This script creates the 32-bit APPSDK Linux Packages echo [INFO][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}]PRODUCTVERSION: $PRODUCT_VERSION echo [INFO][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}]Extracting headers/libs/sources and $ARCH-bit pre-built binaries and sample sources
for f in *.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} do echo [INFO][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}]Executing tar -jxvf "$f" -C $PRODUCT_VERSION tar -jxvf "$f" -C $PRODUCT_VERSION done
PKG_NUMBER=${MAJOR_NUMBER}.${MINOR_NUMBER}.${APPSDK_BUILD_NUMBER}.${APPSDK_PKG_MM_NUMBER}
#Moving all contents to ${PRODUCT_VERSION} from Package Number folder echo [INFO]Calling cp -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/${PKG_NUMBER}/* ${PRODUCT_VERSION} cp -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/${PKG_NUMBER}/* ${PRODUCT_VERSION} RetVal=$? if [ $RetVal -eq 0 ]; then rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/${PKG_NUMBER} fi
cp -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/AMDAPPSDKROOT/* ${PRODUCT_VERSION} if [ ! -d "${PRODUCT_VERSION}/docs" ]; then mkdir -pv "${PRODUCT_VERSION}/docs" fi cp -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/AMDAPPSDKROOT/docs/* ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/docs
rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/AMDAPPSDKROOT
rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/include/legacy-acl rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/lib/x86/legacy-pluginHelloWorld.so rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/resources rm -rvf ${PRODUCT_VERSION}/docs/*.rtf
echo [INFO][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}]Executing "$MAKESELF" --bzip2 $PRODUCT_VERSION AMD-APP-SDK-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.sh "AMD APP SDK v${ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION} Self Installing script" ./install.sh "$MAKESELF" --bzip2 $PRODUCT_VERSION AMD-APP-SDK-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.sh "AMD APP SDK v${ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION} Self Installing script" ./install.sh
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo [INFO][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}][${SH_NAME}][${LINENO}]Executing tar -cvjf AMD-APP-SDKInstaller-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} AMD-APP-SDK-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.sh tar -cvjf AMD-APP-SDKInstaller-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.${ARCHIVE_EXTENSION} AMD-APP-SDK-v$ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION-${OSTYPE}${ARCH}.sh fi

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:

APP SDK Packages Notification

STATUS

The DSE Build System finished building the ${PROJECT_NAME}

Status: ${BUILD_STATUS}
BuildNumber: ${PRODUCT_VERSION}
Originator: ${CAUSE}
Changes: ${CHANGES}
Download URL: ${BUILD_URL}
Build Console: ${BUILD_URL}console
